page.title: 17ECOLOGY
page.content: Most people wish to preserve the area character by maintaining strict {Green {Belt}controls.More derelict farms will be converted to residences with live- stock as a hobby.Increased interest in {Gardening and Tree Planting}.On the lower slopes -afforestation.Hopefully the area will be enhanced by increased {rural based tourist attractions}hiking walking and horse riding with better provision of facilities-craft centres and the development of the {Cotton {Stones Leisure Centre}Most people hope that there will be no change They do not wish to lose their identity.Many wish the area to be a{Smokeless Zone} to protect the moorlands from toxic deposits. More organised {car parks } willbe necessary.
